lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: My challenges seem pretty small in comparison.
lender.occupational_info: I decorate clothing.

lender.name: Rogério
lender.loan_because: I believe that they will do the best with the money

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I hope to open a business soon too and I realize how important funding is. I also want to help small businesses help their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Firefighter and a Paramedic in the inner city in a large city in the southern area of the USA.

lender.name: giovanna
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have more than enough and like sharing.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I like helping others and I find this an incredible way to help others on their lifes... a very good alternative to standard donations
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computing systems adminisitrator on a public research center (Sincrotró Alba) in Barcelona

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot by American standards, but by others, I am rich. In other words, I have a lot of stuff I don't have to share with others. So I'm sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist who does many portraits and abstract work also.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get started with their business and provide for their family and society. The more successful people there are, the more it helps build a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and build computer systems for a book publishing company. I spend much of my day troubleshooting computer glitches and writing software that helps make our company more efficient.

lender.name: Sherry, Jacob and Alana
lender.loan_because: We want to offer others a fair chance to succeed.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I feel a social responsibility to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I have a very interesting job! I work in the Laboratory of Paleo-environmental Research at a university and I count how much maize pollen, (a relative of corn) is in a sample of soil that came from the bottom of a lake in Costa Rica. Maize needs people to help it grow and we do this so we can find out when people starting living around this lake many thousands of years ago.

lender.name: Filippo
lender.loan_because: I do not believe in "Dead Aid", but I believe in creativity.
lender.occupational_info: I have been working in the field of media for 3 years. I have worked for MTV Italy since 2007 and I am currently working on Volamondo, that is a Websites Network that operate in tourism. www.volamondo.it.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: Idea developer

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: To give something back to the world community.
lender.occupational_info: Online Publisher - What Consumer is a portal for UK consumers providing advice, guides and a forum.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: I love to see great ideas in action.

lender.name: The Schmitt Family
lender.loan_because: Because my Father would give his last dime to someone who needed it. I could never be that charitable. My first loan is a Gift to my son because he can be. My Father would be very proud of him. I know I am.

lender.name: Brady
lender.loan_because: I have the means to do so. It just makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: You know how people always say I want to do this or I want to do that? I help people figure out why they don't and then get them to a place of I'm doing this or I'm not.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: of the belief that you do unto others as you would have them do unto you
lender.occupational_info: I work in healthcare PR

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people secure their homes from burglaries with alarms and security systems.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: God blesses me so I can bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist others to make them more successful.

lender.name: Lassi
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy and psychology.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: A small amount can make a huge impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time Concordia University Student.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a teacher at university.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want people to have access to capital in good and unconventional ways for good and unconventional ideas.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: people have helped me when I needed it, sometimes even strangers. I want to be someone who turns around and helps others when they need it, even strangers :-)

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think everyone in the world deserves the chance at a great and prosperous life

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to support themselves and their families with a little help from others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to international students so they can study in the U.S. to reach their goals and find their dreams.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I love to write.

lender.name: Rick & Cynthia
lender.loan_because: We are thankful that we can!

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I think that loaning microcredits is probably the most direct help in poor countries with an inmediate positive impact

lender.name: Märta
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Just Eyewear
lender.loan_because: We're trying to give back and believe in the effectiveness of microloans.
lender.occupational_info: We sell affordable prescription glasses online.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: ... of the convinction that borrowing is more useful than donations.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: my brother is awesome and inspires me to give
lender.occupational_info: as an art therapist i work with children who have mental or emotional disorders in their homes

lender.name: Randy and Tina
lender.loan_because: We all must do what we can to help each other and make the world a better place.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is an excellent initiative.
lender.occupational_info: Planning the revolution

lender.name: Raul
lender.loan_because: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world. ~Anne Frank
lender.occupational_info: Over 10 years of online marketing experience. Always staying on top of the cutting edge of online marketing. Passing on the experience with our clients. As a small business owner myself I know how challenging it is to start your own business on a shoe string budget. I'm happy to help out others in any way I can even if it's a small donation any amount helps. I encourage others to consider donating to these businesses. Do you're part and help out the global community.

lender.name: Susanna
lender.loan_because: Because I want to share the welfare I have with the people in greater need for it.

lender.name: Kelly and Desmond
lender.loan_because: We like the idea and want to help.
lender.occupational_info: We provide respite to those who need it by managing a group of cottages by the coast (in south-western Washington State's Long Beach Peninsula area), called Shakti Cove Cottages.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe people should help each other realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on how the government can better protect people from natural and manmade disasters.

lender.name: Joe Cav
lender.loan_because: We are honoring the Lord when we give to Him (Prov. 3:9).
lender.occupational_info: World Championship Fighting (WCF) is a promotional company focused on live Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) events. WCF is the North East Area’s leading mixed martial arts sports association, formed in June, 2006 by Joseph Cavallaro and Associates, LLC.

lender.name: niesha
lender.occupational_info: Helping people live life the best that they can

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an organization where I can help support hard working people. It is one of the best ways to help people improve their life that I have ever heard of.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer programs.

lender.name: Sudhindra
lender.loan_because: I like to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Computers for businesses

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help - every little bit helps and I love the concept of micro-lending
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: To share the blessings that God has given me in this life.
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure that food is safe to eat.

lender.name: Dan Kraus
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: putting the money to work to help an entrepreneur in another part of the world is a much better use of my resources than leaving it in a bank account.
lender.occupational_info: Service development manager for a homeless charity in Stevenage: www.haven.ik.com.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: Because I love utensils!

lender.name: Will Spencer

lender.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am now mainly a family caregiver, but I have been a weaver for many years.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I love this business model. Each of us can have an amazing impact and have fun at the same time. Great job Kiva!

lender.name: Hima
lender.occupation: I am currently a medical student
lender.loan_because: If a small loan is what it takes for someone to start or keep a business and work towards a better life, then why not. I was inspired by my brother who suggested micro-lending years ago and by Nicholas Kristof's article on the same subject in the NY times.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I'm a Humanist. http://www.iheu.org

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: The true measure of a society is not its wealth or technological advancement, but how it treats its less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am hopeful that my contribution to Kiva will make a difference in the lives of people in many different parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom taking care of my husband, kids, pets, and extended family.

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: Even one person can make a difference.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I know the difference it makes when someone takes an interest in what your trying to achieve and lends a helping hand to make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I have an interest in technology including Wireless Hotspot solutions - Wi-Fi! My company ITWare supplies wireless hotspot in a box equipment to Cafes, Restaurants, Hotels, Resorts, Library's etc worldwide.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe in this process and because helping people become self supporting is important to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children helping them with their problems.

lender.name: Mica
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide clean water and new roads to cities.

lender.name: Ami
lender.loan_because: Assisting a woman in need so she can help herself and her children out of poverty is the least that I can do for my less fortuante sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer at a university helping company's to hire engineering students for internships and jobs. I also go to school and am studying for my BS degree.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves and share my success with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student as well as a teaching assistant.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others achieve their goals. In the past many people have been generous with their time towards myself, and I would like to share that.
lender.occupational_info: Install home security systems and alarms.

lender.name: Arlon
lender.loan_because: I like to make money off the poor, eventually I will have 1000 loans and no longer have to work!! this is great I love kiva
lender.occupational_info: game testing is like working for the devil

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I would rather help improve somebody's life than spend it on myself.

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: Because I can ... (SP: porque puedo) I would like more people from my own country could help other ecuadorians and people all around the world.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a powerful agent of change, and I'm grateful to be able to play a small part in this organization.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a nonprofit organization that works with global disability issues - I love my work!

lender.name: Traugstenthorn
lender.loan_because: I've traveled around south america and believe that most businesses are sound and growing. the investment will in turn produce more jobs hopefully and easier lives for those who are wisely using the funds raised .
lender.occupational_info: i fix electronics, repairing oilfield equipment.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to better their own lives.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute and help out those who are looking to create a better life for themselves and thier families through entrepreneurship
lender.occupational_info: I prepare homes for sale by creating universal warmth within the space which results in maximizing the homes' selling potential and reduces the amount of time the house is on the market

lender.name: Christine

lender.loan_because: We like to idea of helping another to help themselves

lender.name: Douglas Family

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: Its awesome knowing you can help someone halfway around the world with a few clicks of the mouse.

lender.name: Simon
lender.occupational_info: The people we work with do not get two full meals a day

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe that my Father has made me a steward of all He has given into my care. I want to bless those in need who want to do what they can for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Pastor of a congregation of ~30 people in metropolitan Perth (WA). The average age of the congregation is between 55 years.

lender.name: Nana
lender.loan_because: We would like to do this in memory of our Grandmother, Julia De La Garza.

lender.name: Neo Scooters
lender.loan_because: one day I would like to be able to provide affordable gas scooters and electric scooters to some of these distant countries.
lender.occupational_info: We sell gas scooters, electric scooters and electric bikes online. In addition we also sell a large number of scooter helmets imported from China.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can and it is needed. Period.
lender.occupational_info: I am teach at a University in the US.

lender.name: Babak
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work for a charity assisting exoffenders integrate back into society.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to earn all the positive things I have been given in life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a US Army officer currently deployed in Afghanistan near the Pakistan border.

lender.name: Joanne and Mike
lender.loan_because: In the U.S. we have many opportunities to make a good life for ourselves and I want to do my part to help someone else realize their dreams too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for scheduling the production of three cheese manufacturing plants.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: it's a simple and effective way to make a difference in someone life
lender.occupational_info: raising money so we can take action to stop climate change, save forests and generally save the planet for the next generation

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: people are blessed in order to bless others.

lender.name: Anahita
lender.loan_because:
I believe we are all connected.
"All things are connected, like the blood which unites one family. All things are connected. Whatever befalls the earth befalls the sons of the earth.
Man did not weave the web of life, he is merely a strand in it. Whatever he does to the web, he does to himself."
- Chief Seattle, 1854
lender.occupational_info: I currently working as a scientist in a research lab. I am planning on going to graduate school next year to pursue a PhD in Neuroscience.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: We need to do an effort to help all those entrepreneurs around the world build a better world for everyone
lender.occupational_info: Actually I am responsible for a product support team in a world class organization.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to raise financing as a self-employed person

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I feel that I need to help other people outside of Kansas.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: Timo J
lender.loan_because: I loan because I loan. I'm serious

lender.name: Ng Chun Kay
lender.loan_because: I came from a poor family. During the day, i really hope that someone can offer help to my family. Currently, i have the ability, i would like to make a promise here, i would like to lend at least 25 dollar each month ^_^ . Heal the world and have a better world.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Governments do not lend to people
lender.occupational_info: A never-ending search for the perfect rhythm section.

lender.name: Bud & Laura
lender.loan_because: As retired small business owners we relate to people who work hard and dream.

lender.name: Matías
lender.loan_because: To give a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Director of a non profit organization in Argentina.

lender.name: Project Raw Kindness
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference for someone who is not as fortunate. We want everyone to be able to succeed, and be independent.
lender.occupational_info: We create and sell jewelry, and lend the profits through Kiva.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a good way to give people a very good chance to enhance their own business abilities in order to be as successful as they can possibly be in life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate in Economics individual, working in finance for an insurance company in London.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: God has always remained faithful to ALL my needs during the feasts and famines of life. I love Jesus and want all the world to know unconditional compassion.
lender.occupational_info: With all my heart, soul, mind and strength, I desire to be the hands, feet, shoulders, tears, laughter, mercy, and grace of Jesus. I serve my family and local community in obedience to the whispers of God's leading. I am privileged to be the steward of 2 precious boys, Jonathan (14) & Justin(12). Since the age of 15, I share the greatest love of the 21st century with my husband Matt. My heart opens wide to youth, to the homeless, and to those who have been abused.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Kiva reminds me that I can make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe that targeted lending benefits not only entrepreneurs growing businesses but also the world's social and economic health.
lender.occupational_info: I write books for teenagers. I am very fortunate to have my books published in many languages around the world. I also make videos on YouTube with my brother.

lender.name: Rachel Jaro
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed

lender.name: Leta
lender.loan_because: I want to help create opportunity and alleviate poverty. Mother Teresa said "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other".
lender.occupational_info: Working for an agency, to provide 1:1 time, focused on the specific needs and goals of people with disabilities. Support and facilitate independent living in the community.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: i believe in people and know when driven, we are capable of being very successful.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people better their lives when they otherwise may not have been given the oppurtunity.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe that one person has the ability to change the world. When millions of people have this same philosophy - something brilliant happens.
lender.occupational_info: In simplest terms, I work for a company that helps businesses expand globally

lender.name: Nathan
lender.whereabouts: Cape Town Western Cape, South Africa

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Giving is good for the soul.
lender.occupational_info: Website Developer.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It is important for me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop relationships/partnerships with nonprofit, governmental, and quasi-governmental agencies in East KY to help address needs related to education, health, entrepreneurial and community development.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.occupation: Head of Operational Management and Development
lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to help others out of poverty without any loss of their dignity and because it shows God's unequivocable love for them.
lender.occupational_info: I look after a team who organise students' essays and exams in subjects to do with finance and banking, arrange for them to be marked and then make sure they get their results.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough, and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Doing research to find ways to cure autoimmune diseases.

lender.name: SHAY
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Money is for using on things that truly make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the biotechnology field, assisting in developing new biologically derived therapeutics to treat challenging diseases.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Power to the people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music to children.

lender.name: LAURA
lender.loan_because: if you support an entrepreneur, they can flourish and in turn, they will support their own families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a radio station in Los Angeles promoting companies in the Los Angeles area.

lender.name: Four Jewels
lender.loan_because: believe in the entrepreneurial spirit of all people.
lender.occupational_info: We design and create jewelry in sterling silver.

lender.name: betty&james
lender.loan_because: I was able to open my own business and realize my career goal because I was able to secure loans, both personal and though a bank. I wish to help others achieve their goals and improve their living standards.
lender.occupational_info: I own a clothing store. I buy and sell clothing and shoes to men and women. I love helping people feel good about themselves through clothing. We focus on quality over quantity.

lender.name: Kurt and Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Enabling people to make a living with dignity reveals the kingdom of God on earth. We don't think we are blessed with money because of our own efforts or just for our own benefit. Loaning is one way we can pour ourselves out for others.
lender.occupational_info: Kurt is a software engineer and works at HP. He writes programs that run on computers and printers. Stephanie is starting her own craft business and works as a customer care associate at a retail chain called Anthropologie.

lender.name: Rob & Audrey
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to be able to share God's love with people all over the world!

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by Christ, and seek to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a small church, trying to proclaim Christ in all I do and encourage others to do the same.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic idea and I want to help entrepreneurs around the world accomplish their business goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, managing a team of people that help with technology in my company.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Even better than a donation, you are helping someone build a better life. And when they pay it back, you can do it all over again!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pension fund. My job involves improving the technical and financial aspects of the pension fund. I get to learn about different investment types, including investments in emerging markets.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: All I have belongs to God. I believe God would rather these people have my 50 dollars than I should have a new pair of snowboarding pants.
lender.occupational_info: I help to raise young men and women to know Christ through my actions and the advice I give. I'm a Jr. High Youth Director, a youth pastor in training more or less.

lender.name: Mahala
lender.occupational_info: Love changes everything.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I was born into a poor family and appreciate the help others gave me.
lender.occupational_info: I help elders take take of their needs and families learn how to help their elders.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: My money gets bored just sitting in the bank.
lender.occupational_info: Romans 12:16 Live in harmony with each other. Do not be arrogant, but associate with humble people. Do not think that you are wiser than you really are.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others to make a difference in their lives...

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I admire those who have the courage to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people look after their savings and investments.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: ...I can!
lender.occupational_info: I help college students in the United States improve their study and life skills, stay in school, and graduate.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: it gives very deserving, very hardworking people all over the world a chance to improve their own circumstances as well as the communities in which they live...

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro lending as a way to create sustainable change for women in developing countries. Research suggests that by helping women, you are more likely to help the larger family and community that she lives in. I have traveled to Leon, Nicaragua and it changed my perspective in many ways.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: Freshman at Clemson University

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: J'ai la chance d'habiter un pays où il est possible de réaliser ses rêves. J'aime voyager et j'ai croisé beaucoup de gens qui doivent travailler beaucoup plus fort pour subvenir aux besoins minimaux de leur famille. Je veux contribuer à leur permettre de réaliser leurs rêves.
lender.occupational_info: Je suis ingénieure en hydraulique des ouvrages hydro-électriques.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Micro finance can really help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small asset manager

lender.name: Motorcycle Transport
lender.loan_because: From Little Things Big Things Grow !
lender.occupational_info: Motorcycle Transport and shipping services Australia and Worldwide.

lender.name: Georges
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Someone with too much time on their hands, but who enjoys every minute !

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others.

lender.name: Mahipal Lunia
lender.loan_because:
I know how good it feels when someone says yes in ones moment of need. Have been lucky in my life where people have helped me out, now its my turn to help out others by paying it forward.
My goal is to help out one person/entrepreneur a day for the next 7 years (starting Oct 2009). I choose this forum to contribute because its one way to give that helps those getting help build their own self esteem and their own way of being in the world.
lender.occupational_info: My work is primarily in transformation - both business and personal. Life has been checkered and yet new growth emerges when transformation is accepted as the way of life.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I sell books to teachers and librarians

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I am a Christ follower.
lender.occupational_info: Lowest days pay for hardest days work. That is lawn mowing. But has instant results.

lender.name: Hunter
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have had people that believe in me, and I would love to convey that passion through my help as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently enrolled at the University of Tennessee. It is located in Knoxville, TN U.S.A. Though I am student now, I have had several jobs in the past, and feel that it is time to help where I can.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward - it is the best way to express gratitude.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I get real enjoyment out of what goes on here, and it's all free!
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently an undergrad at Yale

lender.name: Party Oz
lender.loan_because: Life is like a box of chocolates.. you never know what you're gonna get!
lender.occupational_info:
Guide to party, parties and hospitality where you can learn everything there is to know about throwing a great party!
We show YOU how to Party Party Party!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I love that I can help make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who want to stay in an apartment building, whether it is for a few days or a few months.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of others in a way that will last beyond my involvement.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales manager for a property tax consulting company. We help large national companies manage their property tax obligations and assure proper assessment of their property.

lender.name: Only Melbourne
lender.loan_because: Melburnian's do!
lender.occupational_info: OnlyMelbourne is a web based guide and directory dedicated to the people and city of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want people to feel dignity and joy
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor-teacher, helping people learn tools to be healthy and happy

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: Together we can help improve the quality of someone's life. It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: E. DAVID
lender.loan_because: When i was 13 I had a small biz cutting grass and doing lawn work -collecting things for recycling - After high school i went to work and not University - i have been a truck driver, road worker and a house cleaner and made donuts in a bakery - i have also done a lot of construction work and still like working with my hands .. i know how it is to work hard without any help - This Is Why I Lend - Im doing ok now and want to help other hard workers like me to have their dream of a better life .
lender.occupational_info: Caretaker - Landlord - Fix It Guy ..

lender.name: Elvis
lender.loan_because: We want to help others fulfill their dreams by fascilitating their efforts to build a more secure future for their families.
lender.occupational_info: When a natural catastrophe hits a major U.S city my company represents the homeowner in recouping the full fair amount of money due to them from their insurance company as a result of the loss they incurred.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: the money will do more good out in the world than sitting in my bank account.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I'm a nerdfighter, and lowering worldsuck is what I do.

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: I'm a strong believer in microfinance and empowering people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Recent International Development grad looking for the perfect job!

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I care about people in this world. One of my dollars could make a HUGE difference in theirs, so just imagine what one hundred dollars can do!

lender.name: dan
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish feed him for a day teach a man to fish feed him for a life time.
lender.occupational_info: aircraft mechanic

lender.name: chizang
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Ubuntu Linux to bring free and open computing to the world.

lender.name: Kaas
lender.loan_because: I know from my own past that a little bit of help goes a long way when you don't have a lot to begin with. So I'd like to help out folks the way I was helped out too.

lender.name: Mary and Ross
lender.loan_because: My son Ross and I are both involved with Kiva because we wish to help other families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a website and database developer. Ross just graduated from high school and will start college in September.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I am able to do so, and I am hoping to help.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate throughout my life. I wish to help those who have been less fortunate.

lender.name: Arlen
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see people achieving their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers to help people use the Internet to earn a living.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: This is a really neat opportunity. I like helping people that are willing to work hard and take initiative.

lender.name: Daphne
lender.loan_because: I feel extremely fortunate to have everything I need... others should have the same ability to reach independence by following their dreams. Reaching out to give someone a helping hand does not require immense wealth... just faith and the willingness to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work providing services to those who have become unemployed and are looking for temporary financial assitance.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to have their basic needs met - no one should be hungry or thirsty. I believe in striving for self-sufficiency (when possible). Poverty should not exist. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school for my Masters in Social Work. I want to help vulnerable children and families.

lender.name: pauline
lender.loan_because: i think we all want to help in some way and a lot of the times we don't know exactly how to reach out. finding the right organization, cause and purpose is just the beginning. sometimes when you're dealing with big organizations, you don't exactly know where or who the money is going to, or what the actual benefits will be but with KIVA the purpose is clear, the aim is direct and dreams are endless :)

lender.name: Cindy & Tim
lender.loan_because: We think its a great thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Cindy works with young people in our area. Tim repairs panel damage to cars!

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love to hear the success stories - & to continue to be amazed how much can be achieved with such a small start.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I want to bless Africa the way it has blessed me! I am African and proud of it!

lender.name: Rahim
lender.occupational_info: I am a finance student

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I think social entrepreneurs are an inspiration
lender.occupational_info: investing in companies that are part of the solution to the challenges of sustainable development, notably climate change

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a very direct and effective way to impact peoples live in a positive way. I prefer to make loans to Africa because I feel connected to the motherland. I mainly invest in female entrepreneurs since I believe they are the foundations of society.
lender.occupational_info: studying History & Philosophy ; building websites / repairing computers; editing articles

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: in our world chances for a good live are very uneven distributed but everybody willing to improve their lives deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working for Siemens in Singapore since 10 years helping to improve the customer service business for Siemens Healthcare across the Asia Australia region by advancing the efficiency and quality of processes and related IT implementations.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping out someone doing it harder than me. I also enjoy watching a little battler acheive their goal
lender.occupational_info: I do technical and graphical drawings for automation in the Dairy Industry.

lender.name: student help
lender.loan_because: it helps others with business startups and makes good students great business owners in developing nations
lender.occupational_info: helping students

lender.name: Nanouk
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help multiple people to create better living conditions for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own company preparing and delivering healthy meals. With mainly biological, and where possible Fair Trade ingredients.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have more than I need and have been commanded to give. But do not give because I have been commanded.
lender.occupational_info: I grow Durum Wheat, Field Peas, Flax, Canola, and Rye on about 800 acres. I also work with my dad in farming his land as well. Farming is not just a job for me, it is a passion.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference for people who are hardworking and willing to make life better for themselves and their families but do not have the resources to get started by themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Education and finding culturally and behaviourally appropriate solutions for good health throughout the world.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that my small gift will make an incredible difference for someone I would never be able to help otherwise.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I make computers work together

lender.name: Morriss Family
lender.loan_because: it's such a simple way to help.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I found donating to be empty. IN other words, I would send out the money and no see the results. At least with loans, I see a result in the loan being paid back.

lender.name: Merry Kay
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get the start I was given by my family
lender.occupational_info: I help people be better at their jobs and help them be productive in their daily activites to produce something.

lender.name: Pat and Chloe
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer Project Facilitator for dam rebuild

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: if you're willing to work, I'm willing to help.

lender.name: jianming
lender.loan_because: I feel really happy if I can help someone who is working hard to realise his/her dream in a country I have never been to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sourcing expert in China, we offer sourcing service and company verification service to overseas company that trade with Chinese suppliers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We can all use a little help now and then.
